title: Sunlight Song Lyrics from Pon Ondru Kanden
stanzas:
sunlight patta kannu koosu
breakfastku only fruits
city pooraa orey dhoosu
girlfriends thaane enaku boost

ennapaathaa they propose
celebritylam enakku close
paparazzeku koduppen pose
naan ethupannaalum adhuthaan news

konjanaalaa naan sogamaana single
indurmattumila eppavume humble
lifestylelam onnumilla simple
weaknessnaa azhagaana pengal

paathupome maathipo engal
from next week I am not reachable
udane sollu edhunaalum possible
pesalaam pazhagalaam Friday to Thingal

no doubt babe azhagula 10uku 10
irundhaalum ava friends mela enakoru kan
I know namma culturela onnuku one
adadaa adhula ennada irukuthu fun

ennoda template dialog
unnamattumthaan panren anbu
what you doing bmla slidu panna
Iam borednu lighta oru hintu thandhaa
daddy mummy en veetula ilaathathaal
will be nice nee vandhu oru hello sonnaa

friday night en calanderla vanthaa
heavy tripla kaatuven bandhaa
verum kaiya naan veesittu vandhaalo
company kodukka varisaiyila ninaa

kanmuney littaa vandhaa
kittavandhu mittaai thanthaa
day onela friendA irundha
poga poga adhellaam kadanthaa

lovuku venum rendu manasu
andha stagelaam enaku palasu
what to do idhu youngu vayasu
kedaikura varaikum kaiyyavittu alasu

no doubt babe azhagula 10uku 10
irundhaalum ava friends mela enakoru kan
I know namma culturela onnuku one
adadaa adhula ennada irukuthu fun

sunlight patta kannu koosu
breakfastku only fruits
city pooraa orey dhoosu
girlfriends thaane enaku boost
